text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— Daagh! It's over my head! What're we messin' up? Why's she not spilling the beans!?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What in heck was so scuffed 'bout our performance!? You straight told us we're up to snuff…!

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: I am regretfully unable to tell you anything more. It is something you all must find out by yourselves.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: We will reduce the number of group practice sessions from here on. Please think carefully about what it is you are lacking whilst you continue with your own practice.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: …… All Sacred Equines must face this trial. I expect to see your answers at the final presentation.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: We'd been doing so well up 'til now……! Y'mean it was too early to consider this bagged…?!

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… Perhaps she has seen through to my immaturity. As I thought, I am still lacking in discipline.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: —— Crud. Ain't no time for bellyaching! We oughta hit the grindstone 'n polish our act!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… However, Ms. Mukai told us that we met her standards. Perhaps we should consider elements beyond the practical?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: What then? Y'got something figured out…?!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Well…… I apologize, I have yet to work out a concrete direction ——

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: This camp don't got long. Need'a do what we can right now…! Can't be lettin' our teamwork go down the drain ——

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: —— A'ight, enough!

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Wha- What in heck, Inari!? Whatchu shoutin' for!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Let's put the talkin' behind us for a mo' an' go enjoy a bath together.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Say wha!? This ain't no time for a dip! You proper followin' here!?

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: 'Course I'm followin', that's why I'm tellin' ya to pipe down!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: …… The thing is, Tama. This Sacred Equine Relay's been runnin' since ancient times, an' as one of them horsegirls myself, I wanna make it a grand success.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: An' with that, my goal's to be a class-act Sacred Equine, an' show 'em that The Inari is right here!

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: But ya know, I ain't be reachin' that far tryin' on my own. We're all in it together, ya'll gotta be there to make it grand.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: An' for that to happen, we need some crackin' fun bozos, like you pipsqueak leadin' with a banner three times the size a' ya.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Me an' y'all are scramblin' our heads with this sudden junk. We still got time after a nice bath and chat, yeah? Boss?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ……… Pfehh. Throwing in pipsqueak's pushing it now.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: ………… Inari's right. Sorry, folks. I got a li'l hasty.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: No, I should apologize as well. I felt a little pressured and provided a badly thought out opinion. ……Let us take a break.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Haah～ …I'm melting away～ Straight melting into the water…… Thinking 'bout it, we were drippin' with sweat after practice…

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Tama…… please don't melt away……

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: I see ya melting jus' same… This ain't good… we best get out a min……

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Hahah, y'alls relaxin' like nothin' else. Now this is what ya want a bath to be!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… It could be a great idea to take a hot springs trip with you and Chiyono O someday.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: That is…… an exciting proposal. I can picture Chiyono O being pleased with it, too.

text_block_list.name: Inari One
text_block_list.text: Wheew～! That got me feelin' like grass after rain! Aaa'ight, what're we gon' do then?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… After relaxing in the hot water, I have thought of a few suggestions. Shall we talk them over in the refreshing breeze outside?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: —— What do you think about looking deeper into the Sacred Equine Relay?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Look deeper…… you mean its history 'n whatnot?

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Precisely. I was thinking earlier, I don't actually know much about the Sacred Equine Relay. Do I really understand it?

text_block_list.name: Oguri Cap
text_block_list.text: Understand it…… Now you say it, I don't know anything other than it being a ceremony to appease and praise the wishes of ancient horsegirls……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Truth be told, ever since reciting the Verse of Solace I felt that this ceremony must hold a very rich history… and very deep emotions are involved.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Thus perhaps what we are lacking is an understanding…… of that part.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: 'N so you wanna dig into it, huh. …Sure could be a swell idea. No harm in learning 'bout 'em Sacred Equines anyhow.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Gotta admit I never thought t'look into its history that far…… Really pullin' through for us here, Ardan～!

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: …… You give me too much praise. It simply happens that this relates to the reason I wished to become a Sacred Equine.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: As I try to leave my mark on this world despite the fragility inherent in my body, leaving me at times unable, "history" has been the object of my desires, a place I long to be.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Considering the ancient nature of the Sacred Equine Relay, I was therefore delighted with the chance to carve my name onto a small fragment of its long history.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Moreover, I went into the Sacred Equine Relay with the hope that the experience would help me to shine yet brighter in the future……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: For this reason I reflected upon my thoughts. Was I being truthful, earnestly facing the history that I was trying to carve myself into?

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: …… Well y'know, we can face it anew from today. Together, yeah? As pals looking to be Sacred Equines.

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: But we are going to require historical documents to look further into it. One hopes that there is something like a library nearby……

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: There is actually someone I would like to check with first. I think I will go inquire when we return ——

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: —— These are the historical records on the Sacred Equine Relay kept by the Preservation Association, please peruse them at your leisure.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Thank you for allowing us to look through them. We will treat them with the utmost care.

text_block_list.name: President Mukai
text_block_list.text: …… Good luck to you all. I shall take my leave here ——

text_block_list.name: Yaeno Muteki
text_block_list.text: …… 'Tis just like Ardan to think of talking directly to President Mukai. I am very impressed. Thanks to that, we have obtained a great many records.

text_block_list.name: Tamamo Cross
text_block_list.text: Sure I talked big 'bout facing things together 'n all, but are we really reading all these…? Sweat's dripping off Oguri already.

text_block_list.name: Mejiro Ardan
text_block_list.text: Let's give it our best together. The answers we seek are surely somewhere in here.
